title: Mark Ruffalo and Jared Leto reveal their New York Comic-Con disguises - Fun
text: Mark Ruffalo, perhaps best known for playing Bruce Banner / The Hulk in Marvel's ever-expanding cinematic universe, has revealed his unusual disguise for walking around New York Comic-Con undetected. Yes, this is Mark "Don't I normally look a lot like Columbo?" Ruffalo, wearing a truly... odd face mask as he wandered about the merchandise stalls.
